traits.Description: Likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day. They get a mood bonus if awak at night (23h-6h) and a mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h). They don't get a mood penalty for being in the dark
They have remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. They seem to dance around danger with pretenatural grace

They have become less social since developing psionic powers since they can perform any task on their own and can do without the jealousy of others

traits.Description: Has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother them at all. They don't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects them. They also feel no mood boost from socializing
They love fire. They will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, they will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if their mood is low
They don't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether they're sleeping on a bed or on the ground, they will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time
traits.Stats: Rest rate multiplier +50%

traits.Description: They are a wanderer; an outcast, half-breed mage class frequently dubbed a hedge-mage. Their carefree personality has kept them from developing class abilities. Instead, they have learned to improve on a vast number of utility abilities that allow them to adapt to any situation. Wanderers prefer the open road and gain a mood boost for being in a caravan. Caravans with a wanderer will ignore the movement penalties of any world tile. However, the wanderlust will cause them to suvver a mood penalty for remaining at a colony for too long
